talk.author: did:plc:2bejacqnlm36xsrjvwzzxk2g
talk.utter: I'm looking to make a similar career move, what sites are you using and what are you searching for? I'm also coming from academia so there are particular issues I'm dealing with

talk.author: did:plc:3rxcq5wacdop5thjoh3sny3p
talk.utter: I'm using Indeed primarily, it's the least awful job board I can find so far. I tried a few others but most of them are like ZipRecruiter, which made me want to die, so I'm sticking with Indeed for now. My brand-new job search terms are "threat analyst," "disinformation," and "cognitive threats"

talk.author: did:plc:3rxcq5wacdop5thjoh3sny3p
talk.utter: Earlier I was looking for "editor" or "journalist," which apparently means either "bombard my email with internship offers" OR "get through three pages of the application process before those cheap fucks reveal it's for a 'volunteer position'"

talk.author: did:plc:2bejacqnlm36xsrjvwzzxk2g
talk.utter: ha yes I am familiar with this particular bait and switch -- thank you!
